name: rectangularly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is shaped like a rectangle: The production begins on a bare, grey stage, rectangularly laid out with plain grey walls. The liner for the box consists of a piece of wax paper cut rectangularly, 15 cm × 6 cm.
More examplesFewer examplesThe pizza dough is baked into thin, crisp, rectangularly sliced crusts. After all the public interest in the rectangularly shaped iceberg, NASA released several more images.Something became entangled in the sheets, tearing them rectangularly.
